statements: DELETE FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id = 1 AND response_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM survey_data WHERE question LIKE '%salary%' OR answer IS NULL;
DELETE FROM survey_data WHERE respondent_id = 12345 AND survey_question = 'How satisfied are you?'
DELETE FROM external_tools WHERE tool_name = 'Tool X' OR integration_type = 'API'
DELETE FROM visualization_data WHERE viz_type = 'bar chart';
DELETE FROM dashboard_data WHERE owner = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM visualization_data WHERE dashboard_id = 3 AND visualization_type = 'Bar Chart';
